definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
internal contradiction among the people (pretext for a purge)
pinyin: ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4

definition: On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
containing_words.word: 正确处理人民内部矛盾

sentences.english: Third, we correctly handled the contradictions among the people arising from the new situation.
sentences.chinese: 三是正确处理新形势下的人民内部矛盾。

sentences.english: The fundamental cause of the development of a thing lies in its internal contradictoriness.
sentences.chinese: 事物发展的根本原因在于其内部矛盾。

sentences.english: We must handle the contradictions among the people correctly.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须正确处理人民内部矛盾。

sentences.english: Crazy sign overtaxing the people under the Empire, the inevitable intensification of internal conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 狂征暴敛之下，帝国内部矛盾必然激化。

sentences.english: What I'm arguing is that this is what was going on, and it was an internal Jewish conflict that was going on.
sentences.chinese: 当时的情况就是这样，是一场犹太教内部矛盾。

sentences.english: So is "On the Correct Handling of Contradictions Among the People".
sentences.chinese: 《关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题》也是好的。

sentences.english: The key of constructing the harmonious society is how to handle well the contradictions among the people.
sentences.chinese: 构建和谐社会的关节点就是如何处理好人民内部矛盾。

definition: internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
internal friction/internal dissipation of energy (in mechanics)/fig. waste or discord within an organization
internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
internal contradiction among the people (pretext for a purge)
pinyin: ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4

definition: conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
